features: 📸【Easy to operate and smart connection】The wireless Wi-Fi spy camera clock can be connected to the internet network, you can live broadcast your footage remotely from anywhere in the world anytime, anywhere. Just download the "Lookcam" free app on your mobile phone (Android, IOS) and configure it using the router WIFI (2.4GHz only) by scanning our QR code.It support 12/24 hour system.

⚙️【Hidden Camera】 No one will notice this wireless hidden camera clock. It has a camera with WiFi function. You can see what happen under the camera no matter where you are, just need to download a cell phone app.

🎞️【Motion Sensing】 Setting up the motion detection, the hidden camera will start to writing down when detecting a motion in the field of view of the camera. When the memory space is full, the newest file will overwrite a prior file.

💡【Day and night work cycle recording】 The wireless camera is equipped with excellent 1080P high-definition pixels, which greatly improves the night vision effect. Even in dark environments, you can clearly see what's going on. Insert the Micro SD card into the card slot and turn it on, the camera will automatically start recording. When the memory space is full, it automatically overwrites the oldest file and records in a loop. (This camera does not include SD card)

💬【Reply within 24 hours ＆ satisfaction guarantee】If the equipment fails, we provide 1 year free replacement and free technical support for life. If you have any questions or concerns before or after your purchase, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3-IN-1 Device Our latest spy camera hidden camera looks and functions as a small desk clock and alarm,also has home defense,And most important, remote viewing enables you to monitor the home or office while your not around
HD 1080P Hidden Camera Clock This hidden camera clock camera is equipped with a 1080P HD camera. You can see all the details of the record clearly.

APP Remote Live Video Just connect the clock spy camera to the home or office WIFI network, then you can open the APP on your mobile phone or computer to view and play real-time video anywhere in the world.

Night Vision In addition to regular daytime recording, this hidden camera clock also features an night vision that enable you to see clearly even in the dark Protect your important Files Hidden camera can intelligently detect motion and record data immediately when someone breaks into your home or office, without worrying about losing important evidence. Wide-angle The WIRELESS spy camera has a 150-degree wide-angle view. It can cover an entire large room.
Self Records to Micro SD (128GB max) Self recording videos are saved to micro SD memory card up to 128 gigabyt, come with card reader so you can read it in PC easily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smart and efficient
reviews.reviewText: It’s a really smart way to keep an eye on everything. It was easy to setup and use. It’s small but hard to guess that it has a spy camera. Worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like it has invisible build in camera. it is so small that people can't find it working, which is really amazing,works great and very stylish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good handy product and good value for money
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a small clock for the nursery and stumbled upon this secret camera + digital clock. The camera quality is really good and it helps me monitor the baby when I am not in the nursery. The camera has allowed me to monitor everything. 10/10 would highly recommend because of the quality and value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really compact and invisible camera
reviews.reviewText: The alarm clock is really compact, which I personally like. The LED digits are quite bright and I'm not sure if this will stay on the night stand long-term for that reason. One thing I particularly liked was that the camera is virtually invisible. Looking at the face of the alarm clock when the lights are on, I can't make out the location of the camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little small but the videos are good the time is in 24 hour format I like 12 hour format
reviews.reviewText: To keep an eye on things when I am away so far so good right now I haven’t tried it yet away from home yet but work good around the house

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely a piece of junk! Avoid at all costs!
reviews.reviewText: Poorly made, difficult to set up, would not keep correct time and also no way to set to 12hr format, would not take or record pictures. Attempted to reset and would never connect to app; I kept getting a "device offline" error. Waited "patiently" as per the instructions (which were poor as well), and never could get it to re-connect to the app. Deleted and reloaded the device on the app to no avail. If you like beating your head against the wall and wasting your money, this clock camera is for you. If I could give it zero stars, I would. Unfortunately for me, the returns window has closed, so I'm out $50 on this piece of junk. It's on it's way to the landfill next time the garbage truck comes by. Seriously, buy something else...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t even notice the hidden camera
reviews.reviewText: This product does a good job of hiding the camera. It’s not noticeable and the picture quality is great. This worked perfectly for our living room.
